code: import{useState,useEffect}from'react';import Movie from'../components/Movie';import'../css/main.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Home(){const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[movies,setMovies]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{const getMovies=async()=>{const json=await(await fetch('https://yts.mx/api/v2/list_movies.json?minimum_rating=9&sort_by=year')).json();setMovies(json.data.movies);setLoading(false);};getMovies();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Loading..."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"wrap",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{children:["A Movie List With More",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("b",{children:"\xA0\xA0\u272D 9.0"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"movie_list",children:movies.map(movie=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Movie,{movie:movie},movie.id))})]})});}export default Home;
